name: hurley
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a stick with a wide, flat oval end, used in the game of hurling (= an Irish team game similar to hockey): The television cameras caught him striking another player with his hurley.
revelpix/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] another name for the game of hurling: Many Irish TDs have attracted public attention initially by excelling in hurley or Gaelic football.
More examplesFewer examples Hurling players can catch and carry the ball with their hand but can only pass with a hurley, foot or a slap of the hand. Children have been photographed playing cricket with hurleys on the streets around Croke Park.Players use wooden, axe-shaped sticks called hurleys to hit a small ball (a sliotar) into the opponent's goal. He was a hurley player in County Cork.
